fields.title: About this project
fields.content:
About Vocab

Vocab.ox.ac.uk is a store of controlled vocabularies, ontologies, classifications, taxonomies and thesauri in use by the University of Oxford’s semantic web community. It is hosted and maintained by BDLSS (Bodleian Digital Library Systems and Services), a department of The Bodleian Libraries.

What it contains?

It comprises vocabularies, referenced versions of vocabularies hosted elsewhere that are in use at Oxford and links to other vocabularies. For brevity the broad term ‘vocabularies’ has been adopted to encompass ontologies, classifications, taxonomies, controlled vocabularies and thesauri created or amended by developers at Oxford.

The vocabularies on this site are published as open linked data and are available for re-use in compliance with attached terms and conditions. Members of the University of Oxford are invited to submit semantic vocabularies to this site.

Funding

OAO (Open Access Oxford enabled the site to be updated in 2013.

Project funding from PICT (PRAC ICT committee) in 2010 enabled the development of vocab.ox into a fully developed central service so that members of the University can deposit and disseminate controlled vocabularies produced at the University of Oxford.

Project team

  • Sally is project manager.
  • Neil is release manager.
  • Martin Comina is an ORA funded developer who updated the site 2013.

The Vocab.ox.ac.uk administrators Yvonne Aburrow (XML) and Tanya Grey (RDF) were also involved during the 2013 update.

Anusha Ranganathan was a Pict funded developer who created the original system this update is inspired by. It is based upon a design by Monica Messaggi Kaya who was also funded by PIct.

fields.title: Vocab
fields.content:
Introduction

Vocab.ox.ac.uk is a store of controlled vocabularies, ontologies, classifications, taxonomies and thesauri in use by the University of Oxford’s semantic web community. More about vocab.

Browsing

This store is available for browsing in two ways.

Queries

Please contact us if you have any queries or visit our help page.

Publish

You can also request access to publish items.

fields.title: Contact
fields.content:
Contact

If you need additional information please contact us via email and we'll address your enquiries.

fields.title: Help
fields.content:
Finding items

The Browse page is the main place to find useful items.

Latest version

  • A link exist for each item where you can always get the latest version.
  • For items, where there multiple versions, a link will also appear so you can get an exact version.
  • These are most visible on the compact list available via Browse.

For editors

The following video introduces this website. Further, videos for editors are available.

fields.title: Cookies
fields.content:
Cookies

What are cookies

Cookies are small text files that can be written and read by websites and stored by the browser on your computer, tablet or smartphone. They do a number of things including allowing access to some types of content and functionality to users, and collecting anonymous user information so that site owners can monitor the performance of their sites. They are a kind of .memory. for a website that can help it respond appropriately to users and user behaviour.

Cookies on this website

This website stores cookies for use in Google Analytics. This anonymously tracks individual visitor behaviour on the website so that we can see how the site is being used. We only use this information for monitoring and improving our website and content for the benefit of our users (you).

More information about controlling these cookies can be found at http://www.bodleian.ox.ac.uk/cookies.

fields.title: Publish
fields.content:
Publish

To publish to this website you need to contact a member of the Vocab team. They will consider your request and if successful will grant you access with either of these levels.

1. Edit

If you are member of this group you can edit documents.

2. Add and edit

In addition to document editing members of this group can also edit tags available for assignment to documents.

Further information

  • Your University of Oxford SSO (single sign on) username will be used to login.
  • The system keeps a history of editing so remember to log out on shared computers.

Other levels

Vocab admins mainly deal with users, pages and other other data.

fields.title: Browse
fields.content:
Browse

The following ways are available for browsing this store of controlled vocabularies, ontologies, classifications, taxonomies and thesauri:

Collections

You can see items grouped into collections.

AZ listing by name

A complete list of items available can be found on the A - Z listing.

Compact list

Finally, you can see every item on a single page via the compact listing.

fields.title: Help for Editors
fields.content:
The following videos are for editors of content on this website.

You might need to turn the volume up while watching the following videos because the audio is more feint.

If you notice any changes from these videos to the current website the reason is that these videos were made towards the end of the system development. Changes based upon additional user feedback have occurred.
